citations.narrative:
There were two young Pomeranians that were born on March 1st, 2024 and bought from another breeder. There was no
record of acquisition for the two dogs and they had not been added to the inventory of dogs on hand.
Accurate record keeping is crucial for ensuring a thorough inspection and needed to rapidly identify and trace animals in a
potential disease outbreak.
Each dealer/breeder shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose required
information concerning each dog or cat purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held, or otherwise in his or her
possession or under his or her control, or which is transported, euthanized, sold, or otherwise disposed of by that dealer
or exhibitor. Required information can be found in 9 CFR AWA 2.75 (a) (1) (i-ix).
Correction Date: July 20th, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(a) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors 
There were two young Pomeranians that were born on March 1st, 2024 and bought from another breeder. There was no 
record of acquisition for the two dogs and they had not been added to the inventory of dogs on hand.  
Accurate record keeping is crucial for ensuring a thorough inspection and needed to rapidly identify and trace animals in a 
potential disease outbreak. 
Each dealer/breeder shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose required 
information concerning each dog or cat purchased or otherwise acquired, owned, held, or otherwise in his or her 
possession or under his or her control, or which is transported, euthanized, sold, or otherwise disposed of by that dealer 
or exhibitor. Required information can be found in 9 CFR AWA 2.75 (a) (1) (i-ix). 
Correction Date: July 20th, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
